relnotes.name: CAF Streaming Support
relnotes.purpose: Framework support for Digital Rights Management (DRM) of streaming DRM standards, provides integration with corresponding data protection layers and interfaces for addition of new DRM schemes and their usage.

deliverystep.name: PREQ2193 SMP-Safe Crypto Services Components
deliverystep.preq: Add SMPSAFE keyword in SDP mmp files

deliverystep.name: PREQ782: Crypto Services: CAF
deliverystep.preq: Added Streaming CAF interface, streaming reference agent and test codes. Configured in 9.4 onwards by using marco "SYMBIAN_CAF_STREAMING".
